381 
 
  
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    (iv) BENIN accepts Fine Art, one (1) other Art subject and 
any other subject.  
(v) IAUED accepts one (1) relevant Science subject and 
two (3) other Science subjects. Fine Arts is not 
compulsory.  
(vi) TASUED accepts any three (3) subjects.  
  
  
  
  
EDUCATION AND HAUSA  
ABU  
AL-QALAM  
BASU  
BAYERO         
CE-AKWANGA  
COEA          
COED-DEG  
EDGUMEL  
EDGUSAU(T)  
EDZAR  
FC-KATSINA      
FC-KONTAGORA  
FED-KASHERE  
KICOE-DEG  
NSCOE          
SHAGARI-2        
UDU          
UMYUK   
USCOE       
  
Two (2) ‘A’ level 
passes in relevant 
subjects to include 
Hausa.  
  
Five (5) 'O' level 
credit passes to 
include English 
Language and  
Hausa.  
  
Hausa, one (1) Arts and one 
(1) subject from Economics, 
French, Geography/Physics, 
Government, History, Islamic 
Studies, Literature in English 
and Mathematics.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) UDU and BAYERO accepts NCE merit.   
(ii) UMYUK accepts two (2) 'A’ level passes in Hausa and 
any other Arts subjects. NCE credit in Hausa is also 
acceptable.  
  
UTME  
(i) ABU accepts TC II merit/credit.  
(ii) UMYUK accepts five (5) 'O’ level credit passes to 
include English Language, Hausa and another three 
(3) Arts subjects with 'O' levelcredit pass in 
Mathematics.  
(iii) BAYERO requires five (5)'O' level credit passes to 
include English Language, Hausa plus three (3) other 
subjects.
